title: Collective alignment: public input on our Model Spec
optimized_headline: Public Input Shapes Our Model Spec: What You Need to Know
raw_excerpt: OpenAI surveyed over 1,000 people worldwide on how AI should behave and compared their views to our Model Spec. Learn how collective alignment is shaping AI defaults to better reflect diverse human values and perspectives.
raw_body: OpenAI surveyed over 1,000 people worldwide on how AI should behave and compared their views to our Model Spec. Learn how collective alignment is shaping AI defaults to better reflect diverse human values and perspectives.
speedrun: OpenAI recently conducted a survey with over 1,000 participants globally to gather insights on AI behavior. The findings were compared to their Model Spec, aiming to align AI defaults more closely with diverse human values. This effort emphasizes the importance of collective input in shaping AI systems. As AI becomes more integrated into daily life, reflecting a wider range of perspectives is crucial for societal acceptance and ethical use.
why_it_matters: This survey gives a voice to users, helping to ensure AI behaves in ways that resonate with different cultures and values.
It signals a shift towards more inclusive AI development, which could influence industry standards and expectations moving forward.

lenses.eli12: Imagine asking a crowd how they want a robot to behave, then programming it based on their answers. OpenAI's survey aims to do just that, ensuring AI reflects a variety of human values. This matters because it helps make AI more relatable and acceptable for everyone, not just a select few.
lenses.pm: For product managers and founders, understanding user expectations from this survey can guide AI design choices. It highlights the need for products that resonate with diverse audiences, potentially improving user satisfaction. Aligning with collective values could also enhance brand reputation in an increasingly competitive market.
lenses.engineer: From a technical perspective, this survey's results provide valuable data points for refining AI models. By integrating public feedback into the Model Spec, engineers can adjust algorithms to prioritize behaviors that reflect a broader range of human values. However, the challenge lies in balancing these diverse inputs while maintaining model performance.
